name: Vibe Shard
description:
Travel down an endless tunnel of sweet tunes and endless torment in Vibe Shard! The game features intense button-pressing gameplay, stunning vector graphics, and a whopping three songs!

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47. I do not own any of the songs in the game; they belong to their respective owners.

Ludum Dare Submission Page

If you have any questions, comments, or bug reports, feel free to leave them down below or join the Roseblight Discord server!
